typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		T as string,
		A as string,
		B as string,
		C as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	limit: 100,
	wildcardPaths:['input']) ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		T1 = T,
		A1 = A
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> choose
choose sink(input(
		T as string,
		A as string,
		B as string,
		C as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
